thread.title: Home of the Day: Space, Updates, and a Cul-de-Sac Location
thread.title_full: Home of the Day: Space, Updates, and a Cul-de-Sac Location

author: Joshua Barnhart
title: Home of the Day: Space, Updates, and a Cul-de-Sac Location
text:
712 Colonial Ct. | Salina, KS
$350,000 | 4 bedrooms | 3.5 bathrooms | 3,300 sq. ft.
Homes with this much space, this many updates, and a cul-de-sac address donâ€™t sit quietly.
Located at the end of a cul-de-sac, 712 Colonial Court offers more than 3,300 square feet of finished living space on an oversized 118 x 100 lot, giving buyers room to spread out both inside and out.
The home features four bedrooms plus a large bonus room over the garage, complete with its own heating and air. Zoned electric heat and AC allow for flexibility and efficiency, and the home is fully electric.
Outside, the fenced backyard is designed for use, not just looks. A deck, covered patio, shed, and established perennial landscaping create multiple spaces for entertaining, relaxing, or letting the seasons do their thing. A well and sprinkler system support the yard, and radon mitigation is already installed.
Recent updates add real value, including:
- New roof (2025)
- Updated siding and trim
- 50-year exterior paint
- Pella windows throughout
- Corian kitchen countertops
- Onyx bathroom surfaces
The home also includes a two-car garage, fireplace, family room, and is conveniently located near schools and shopping.
Property details at a glance:
- 4 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms
- 3,300 square feet
- 0.27-acre lot
- Cul-de-sac location
- Bonus room over garage
- New roof (2025)
- Fenced yard with deck and covered patio
- Built in 1977

The property is listed by Steve Thompson and brokered by Coldwell Banker APW Realtors. It was listed January 1, 2026.
